name: Rusty
description: Rusty is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its soldier-like appearance and classic buttons, it stands tall and strong. Rusty's arms and legs are made from durable foundry materials, providing it with the strength and stability needed for its duties. Its screen has a quirky cat design, adding a touch of personality to its otherwise stoic exterior. To ensure maximum protection, Rusty is equipped with a sturdy helmet addon. With its impressive ability_scores and skills, Rusty is a formidable ally to have on any mission.
